sentences.en: A few days later, our armies liberated the city.
sentences.cn: 几天以后，我军解放了这座城市。

sentences.en: In Afghanistan, we helped liberate an oppressed people.
sentences.cn: 在阿富汗, 我们帮助受压迫的人民求得解放.

sentences.en: In recent years, women have been trying to liberate themselves from being regarded as second - class citizens.
sentences.cn: 近几年来, 妇女一直在为把自己从被认为是二等公民的想法下解放出来而努力.

sentences.en: Over 150,000 men landed by air and sea in Normandy to liberate Europe from Nazi oppression.
sentences.cn: 超过15万的士兵分别从空中和海上登陆诺曼底来解放在纳粹压迫下的欧洲.

sentences.en: Taiyuan Liberation Memorial Hall: This district was once one of battlefields to liberate Taiyuan.
sentences.cn: 太原解放纪念馆: 这一带当年曾是解放太原的主战场之一.

sentences.en: The ending of capitalism alone could not liberate women.
sentences.cn: 光靠结束资本主义是无法解放妇女的.

sentences.en: The final purpose of all Marx theories is to liberate human.
sentences.cn: 马克思全部学说的最终目的是实现人的解放.

sentences.en: The free alkali metals react immediately with water to liberate hydrogen.
sentences.cn: 游离的碱金属直接和水中作用,放出氢气.

sentences.en: The goal was to restore the border and liberate South Korea.
sentences.cn: 目标是恢复边界,解放南朝鲜.

sentences.en: These products help to liberate workers from dirty, dangerous and hard work.
sentences.cn: 这些产品使工人不必再从事肮脏 、 危险和艰苦的工作.

sentences.en: These two compounds react in such a way as to liberate oxygen.
sentences.cn: 这两个化合物按这种方式起反应,就能放出氧气.

sentences.en: This small software can liberate your fingers!
sentences.cn: 这个小软件可以解放你的手指 啦 !

sentences.en: This will liberate him from economic worry.
sentences.cn: 这将消除他经济上的忧虑.

sentences.en: We must try our best to liberate our people from poverty.
sentences.cn: 我们必须尽力把人们从贫穷中解救出来.

words.tran_cn: 无拘束的；放纵的（尤指在社交和性关系方面）
解放；使摆脱束缚（liberate的过去式）

trans.tran_en: to free prisoners, a city, a country etc from someone’s control
to free prisoners, a city, a country etc from someone’s control
